subject: My Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
My Dear Beloved Friend,
Sorry for contacting you through this medium, however i do not have any other choice as I am a patient in dare need. I am Mrs Margret Dennis from London and am aged 68 years suffering from endometrial cancer. Please, I want you to help me create a charitable project with the money that I inherited from my deceased husband who died in a motor accident.
 I was brought up from a motherless baby's home and was married to my late husband for twenty nine years without a child, my friends have plundered so much of my wealth since my illness and I cannot live with the agony of entrusting this huge responsibility to any of them anymore, so I sold all my inherited belongings and deposited all the sum of Â£9,000,000 GBP (Nine Million Pounds) with my bank.
All I need is an honest person who will use at least % 70 of the funds as I would instruct, then the rest % 30 will go to you for helping me accomplish this mission because donating this money to charity is the only legacy I can leave behind after my death, No money is required from you to carry on with this project because it is my heart desire to make a generous gift to you to work for a charity in your country.
I don't mind if you are a Christian or Muslim or Hindu or Buddhist rather my only paramount concern here is whether I can trust you because this generation is filled up with greedy and fraudulent people all over the world. I will give you more details as soon as I hear from you.
Looking forward to your urgent response, on my private Email:  
Magretdennis12@hotmail.com
Kind regards.
Mrs Margret Dennis

subject: Re:   My Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Hello Mrs. Margret Dennis,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your current situation. It's truly admirable that you want to leave such a generous legacy behind.

I have a few questions, if you don't mind. Could you please tell me more about the charitable project you have in mind? What kind of cause are you passionate about? Also, how did you come across my contact information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Dear Sir Mr Scot please contact my attorneys.
body:
Dear Sir Mr Scott,


Many thanks for your humble email responses and its content is well noted, my most happiness is to see a child benefit from this fund which is my first ambition since I don't have a child of my own.



Now all you have to do is to contact my appointed lawyer the Paul Smith Attorney who have helped During the deposition of this fund with the bank, he is the person that will direct and advise on how to get this fund transferred from my local bank here to your country, please note that all documentation related to the deposit is with my lawyer and I have informed him this morning that you will contact him, his address is as below:



International Litigation & Legal Affairs Law Firm

Stevenson Baker Associate Chambers South Africa.



Email:stevensonbaker@stevensonbakerassociatechambers.co.za<mailto:stevensonbaker@stevensonbakerassociatechambers.co.za>
info@stevensonbakerassociatechamber.co.za<mailto:info@stevensonbakerassociatechamber.co.za>
Website: https://www.stevensonbakerassociatechambers.co.za



Please ensure you keep me posted in everything to enable me provide more information where is needed. Thanks and God Bless.



From Nurse Janette Douglas,

Nurse Assisting,



Mr Margret Dennis.

subject: Re: Dear Sir Mr Scot please contact my attorneys.
body:
Hello Nurse Janette Douglas,

Thank you so much for your kind and thoughtful email. It's truly heartwarming to hear about your desire to help children with this fund. I'm sure it will make a significant difference in many lives.

I understand that I need to get in touch with Mr. Paul Smith, the attorney who has been handling the deposition of this fund. It's great to know that he is well-informed about our communication and is expecting my contact.

However, before proceeding further, could you please provide me with more details about the process? For instance, what kind of information will Mr. Smith require from me? And how long does it usually take for such a transfer to be completed?

Also, could you kindly clarify what you meant by "all related to the deposit is with my lawyer"? Does this mean all documents and legal paperwork are currently with him?

I appreciate your guidance on this matter and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: please seek all information from the attorneys.
body:
Dear Sir Mr Scott,



Thank for your email, i directed you to Paul smith because you know my health condition hence I may not be capable to always direct you.



Nurse Douglas who assist me at the hospital cannot direct all the time.

Please check what asked you to send to the attorney, send it to them and they will advise more.



I also you also to ask them any question that you are not cleared about.



Mr Scott Sir, I am in a very big pain with my health condition and I know the attorneys cannot let me down, but will advise you on the best thing to do.



Thanks and God Bless.



From Nurse Janette Douglas,

Nurse Assisting,



Mr Margret Dennis.

subject: Re: please seek all information from the attorneys.
body:
Hello Mr. Scott,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your email and understand that you've been directed to Paul Smith due to my current health condition. It's true, I may not always be able to guide you directly.

Nurse Douglas has been a great help at the hospital, but she can't always be there to direct things either. Could you please check what was asked of you to send to the attorney? Once they receive it, they should be able to provide further advice.

If there are any aspects that aren't clear to you, don't hesitate to ask them questions. They're there to help.

I'm currently in a lot of pain due to my health condition, but I trust that the attorneys won't let me down. They'll advise you on the best course of action.

Thank you for your understanding and support during this difficult time. May God bless you.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Re: please seek all information from the attorneys.
body:
Hello Mr. Scott,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your email and understand that you've been directed to Paul Smith due to my current health condition. It's true, I may not always be able to guide you directly.

Nurse Douglas, who has been assisting me at the hospital, also has her hands full and might not be able to direct all the time. 

Could you please check what was asked of you to send to the attorney? Once they receive it, they will provide further advice. Feel free to ask them any questions if there are things that aren't clear.

I'm currently in a lot of pain due to my health condition but I trust that the attorneys won't let us down. They will surely advise you on the best course of action.

Thank you for your understanding and may God bless you.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Re: please seek all information from the attorneys.
body:
Hello Mr. Scott,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out on behalf of Mr. Margret Dennis, who is currently under my care at the hospital due to his health condition.

Mr. Dennis has asked me to direct you to Paul Smith for further assistance as he may not be able to provide the necessary guidance himself due to his current health situation. 

If there are any documents or information that Mr. Dennis has requested you send to the attorney, please do so at your earliest convenience and they will be able to provide further advice.

If there are any aspects of this process that you're unclear about, don't hesitate to ask questions. The attorneys are here to help and guide you through this process.

Mr. Dennis is in a lot of pain due to his health condition but he trusts that the attorneys will not let him down and will advise you on the best course of action.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation during this time. May God bless you.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Re: please seek all information from the attorneys.
body:
Hello Mr. Scott,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out on behalf of Mr. Margret Dennis, who is currently under my care at the hospital due to some health issues.

Mr. Dennis has asked me to direct you to Paul Smith for further assistance as he may not be able to provide the necessary guidance due to his current condition. He believes that Mr. Smith will be able to help you with your queries and guide you through the process.

If there are any specific documents or information that Mr. Dennis has asked you to send over, please do so by sending them directly to the attorney's office. They will be able to provide further advice and answer any questions that you may have.

Please feel free to ask them anything that isn't clear or if there's something more you'd like to know about the process.

Mr. Dennis is in a lot of pain due to his health condition but he trusts that the attorneys will not let him down and will advise you on the best course of action.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation during this time.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Re: please seek all information from the attorneys.
body:

I'm currently in a lot of pain due to my health condition, but I trust that the attorneys won't let me down. They will surely advise you on the best course of action.
